description:
Web server and RESTful backend services for APBS and PDB2PQR
This software was developed to deploy APBS (https://github.com/Electrostatics/apbs) and PDB2PQR
(https://github.com/Electrostatics/pdb2pqr) on Azure to address a gap left by the closing of the previous hosting service at
UCSD
name: Electrostatics/apbs-rest
